# Configuration file for fiwalk

#*.jpeg	dgi	java -classpath /usr/lib/archivematica/archivematicaCommon/externals/fiwalkPlugins/plugins.jar jpeg_extract
#*.jpeg	jvm	/usr/lib/archivematica/archivematicaCommon/externals/fiwalkPlugins/jpeg_extract.jar jpeg_extract

#*.jpeg	dgi	/usr/lib/archivematica/archivematicaCommon/externals/fiwalkPlugins/jpeg_extract
#*.jpg	dgi	/usr/lib/archivematica/archivematicaCommon/externals/fiwalkPlugins/jpeg_extract
#*.pdf	dgi	java -classpath /usr/lib/archivematica/archivematicaCommon/externals/fiwalkPlugins/plugins.jar Libextract_plugin
#*.gif	dgi	java -classpath /usr/lib/archivematica/archivematicaCommon/externals/fiwalkPlugins/plugins.jar Libextract_plugin
#*.mp3	dgi	java -classpath /usr/lib/archivematica/archivematicaCommon/externals/fiwalkPlugins/plugins.jar Libextract_plugin
#*.doc	dgi	java -classpath /usr/lib/archivematica/archivematicaCommon/externals/fiwalkPlugins/plugins.jar word_extract
#*.xls	dgi	java -classpath /usr/lib/archivematica/archivematicaCommon/externals/fiwalkPlugins/plugins.jar word_extract
#*.ppt	dgi	java -classpath /usr/lib/archivematica/archivematicaCommon/externals/fiwalkPlugins/plugins.jar word_extract
#*.docx	dgi	python /usr/lib/archivematica/archivematicaCommon/externals/fiwalkPlugins/docx_extractor.py
#*.xlsx	dgi	python /usr/lib/archivematica/archivematicaCommon/externals/fiwalkPlugins/docx_extractor.py
#*.pptx	dgi	python /usr/lib/archivematica/archivematicaCommon/externals/fiwalkPlugins/docx_extractor.py
#*.odt	dgi	python /usr/lib/archivematica/archivematicaCommon/externals/fiwalkPlugins/odf_extractor.py
#*.ods	dgi	python /usr/lib/archivematica/archivematicaCommon/externals/fiwalkPlugins/odf_extractor.py
#*.odp	dgi	python /usr/lib/archivematica/archivematicaCommon/externals/fiwalkPlugins/odf_extractor.py
*	dgi	python /usr/lib/archivematica/archivematicaCommon/externals/fiwalkPlugins/pronom_ident.py
